url.description: Original URL location of the blog post (potentially malicious).

link.description: Original link into the blog post (Supposed harmless).

archive.description: Archive of the original document (Internet Archive, Archive.is, etc).

username.description: Username who posted the blog post.

verified-username.description: Is the username account verified by the operator of the blog platform.

creation-date.description: Initial creation of the blog post.

modification-date.description: Last update of the blog post.

embedded-link.description: Site linked by the blog post.

embedded-safe-link.description: Safe site linked by the blog post.

removal-date.description: When the blog post was removed.

username-quoted.description: Username who are quoted into the blog post.

description: Blog post like Medium or WordPress.
name: blog
